thread.title: Vote and win
thread.title_full: Vote and win | The Sunday Times

author: The Sunday Times
title: Vote and win
text:
Fundu Lagoon, in Tanzania Fundu Lagoon is a barefoot luxury resort on the remote and unspoilt island of Pemba, just off the coast of Tanzania — and you could be staying there free if you vote in the third annual Times and Sunday Times Travel Awards, which are fast becoming the most respected gongs in the industry.
In this serene beach resort,a series of wooden walkways and sand paths lead to 18 spacious “Makuti” thatched rooms and suites.If you just want to unwind, you can wallow in the infinity pool, stop off for a drink at the poolside bar or splash in the spectacular waters of the Indian Ocean from a forest-fringed beach. The more adventurous can make the most of the resort’s fully equipped dive centreto explore the marine life on the surrounding coral reefs and deep drop-offs.
By night, you’ll sample some of the best food in East Africa, with dishes inspired by
